text: Katamā ca sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati
edit: Katamā ca sā bhikkhave majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?

translations.transtext: What is that practice of moderation, monks, having been realized by the Buddha; making the wisdom eye [and] insight [happen]; leads to pacification, supreme knowledge, enlightenment, [and] nirvana?
